li.description: It keeps getting better and better, and I keep swelling bigger and bigger. Everyone around me is focused solely on me, as it should be.

li.label: Transcendent
li.description: I won't stop until all anyone can see is me. That is the definition of a beautiful world.

li.label: Mythical
li.description: I'm so big that I'm outgrowing the buildings around me. This is bliss.

li.label: Omnipresent
li.description: Those puny buildings were worthless if they couldn't stand in the wake of my opulence. They can all live on me instead.

li.label: Inconceivable
li.description: The entire planet is slowly disappearing underneath me. I will take its place. All is well.

li.label: Fat landscape
li.description: The hunger, the hunger...

li.label: Country-sized
li.description: I can only eat, but it's never enough...so much...
